Also, to those worrying about your saves not working:
This is epilogue DLC, so you should be playing it after you've finished the game anyway.

ALSO, and this is the solution part of my comment, all you need to do is download a trainer (YES, there's a trainer working for THIS patch), give yourself the resources you need, and you can get just about anything you've had by the end of the game.

So no worries, there are always solutions to problems.

@Paperkut I won't try any harder to convince you otherwise.
All I know is that I just finished this DLC using this torrent and that I used HoG's trainer for this version of the game to give me the resources I didn't have because of save incompatibility.

I'll just reiterate the facts: This torrent is real.
I downloaded it, I copied over the patch files, then the crack, then the DLC folder.
I then launched the game, used a new save slot, and started right up the DLC itself.

I have finished it since then, and am currently impatiently waiting for the next Dead Space game.

Yes, this isn't a scene release, nor is this guy (the uploader) a fully trusted user, but the point remains that this torrent is real (and working).

If you don't want to play Awakened for free, don't download this torrent - it's that simple, really.
